thread.section_title: Solar Quotes Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Solar Quotes | solarquotes.com.au
thread.title: Brian Herd
thread.title_full: Solar Quotes reviewed by Brian Herd

author: Brian Herd
title: Brian Herd
text:
Solar Quote: s contacted 3 suppliers for me. They followed up to ensure all 3 installers Quote: d. They also provide rating on the suppliers, gear and help with the interpretations of the government schemes.
The 3 installers were very good. The only difficulty I had was picking one. Their reputations are in the public domain and the people I talked to all gave the impression of being knowledgeable and none were pushy. I was impressed with Class A solar, Energy Aware and Solar Wholesalers. They all merit anyone's consideration.
